price: Sa'an nan kuma Muka gaskata musu alkawari; sai Muka tsẽrar da su da wanda Muke so, kuma Muka halakar da mãsu yawaitãwa.*
arabic: ثُمَّ صَدَقۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡوَعۡدَ فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُمۡ وَمَن نَّشَآءُ وَأَهۡلَكۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ
footnotes: * Mãsu yawaitãwa, sũ ne mãsu wuce haddõdin Allah ga Kõme, fãsiƙai da mãsu bidi'õ'i.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma ṣadaqnāhumu al-waʿda fa-anjaynāhum waman nashāu wa-ahlaknā al-mus'rifīna
